Title: The Defector
Notes: I will not risk the lives of my crew because you think you can dance on the edge of the Neutral Zone.

Title: Yesterday's Enterprise
Notes: The episode is cited as a favorite by crew members and reviewers and is widely regarded as one of the best episodes of the series.

Title: Best of Both Worlds I
Notes: This is just another page in history; isn't it? Will this be the end of our civilisation? Turn the page.

Title: The Drumhead
Notes: With the first link; the chain is forged. The first speech censured; the first thought forbidden; the first freedom denied; chains us all irrevocably.

Title: The First Duty
Notes: The first duty of every Starfleet officer is to the truth. Whether it's scientific truth; or historical truth; or personal truth. It is the guiding principle upon which Starfleet is based.

Title: The Inner Light
Notes: Live now. Make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again.

Title: Chain of Command I
Notes: When children learn to devalue others; they can devalue anyone; including their parents.

Title: Tapestry
Notes: There are many parts of my youth that I'm not proud of. There were loose threads; untidy parts of me that I would like to remove. But when I pulled on one of those threads it unravelled the tapestry of my life.

Title: The Chase
Notes: Inside us are many voices; each with its own desires; its own style; its own view of the world.

Title: All Good Things I
Notes: I should have done this a long time ago.

Title: Generations
Notes: For the stuff about Picard's family

Title: Prey
Notes: If you enjoyed [Seven's] antagonism with Species 8472 in Scorpion; " then "Prey" is the one interesting follow up on it; with her hatred for the Borg's old foe clashing against Janeway's humanitarianism."

Title: The Omega Directive
Notes: Another substantial disagreement [Seven] has with Janeway

Title: Hope and Fear
Notes: Hope and Fear is the season four finale; and provides - while dealing with the rest of the cast - a good sense of a cap on how Seven developed."

Title: Insurrection
Notes: For the intro and Spock mindmeld scene

Title: Nemesis
Notes: For the beginning / wedding scene and the end
